DOC.brief_summary: Percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) bare metal stent ( BMS ) patient renal insufficiency show unsatisfactory result . We therefore design prospective , randomize , multicenter , not-sponsored study directly compare efficacy prevention clinical restenosis everolimus-eluting stent ( Xience V ) bare-metal stent ( Vision ) ( 2nd-generation DES BMS , respectively ) , implanted patient multivessel disease renal insufficiency order obviate multiple unpredictable characteristic high-risk population .

DOC.criteria: chronic renal insufficiency ( creatinine clearance < 60 ml/min , dialysis patient include ) least two significant ( > 70 % ) coronary lesion two major coronary vessel .
